title: Deck of Many Things
desc:
- Can be played on any color, and any color can play off it.
- When you gain a card of this color, you are only shown the backside of the card. and it is labeled as "Card from the Deck of Many Things"
- You may play any card of this color face down or face up.
- If you play a card from this color face down, it acts as Wild [15]
- If you play a card from this color face up, it reveals itself to all players, and it's effect activates.
- There must always be a balance of good to bad <:deck:1106732963577729055> cards in the cards channel, if a bad card is posted, a good card must also be posted and vice versa. Cards labeled as Neutral ignore this rule.
